line: If any part of this exclusion is not valid or cannot be enforced, the other parts
label: paragraph

line: will still be effective.

line: 4 Excess
label: heading

line: We will not pay the first €350 of any claim (unless otherwise shown in the
label: paragraph

line: policy or schedule).
label: paragraph

line: We will not pay for the first €5,000 of any claim for subsidence, landslip or
label: paragraph

line: ground heave.
label: paragraph

line: Claims for water escaping from , or frost damage, to a fixed water, drainage or
label: paragraph

line: heating installation, washing machine, dish washer, fridge freezer, waterbed or
label: paragraph

line: fish tank are subject to a €1,000 excess.
label: paragraph

line: 5 Date change exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not pay for any loss of or damage to any computer equipment,
label: paragraph

line: software or microchip-controlled electrical appliance you own or control, or
label: paragraph

line: for any data lost from any computer, software, database or similar equipment,
label: paragraph

line: caused by or arising from that equipment failing to treat any calendar date as
label: paragraph

line: the correct date.
label: paragraph

line: 6 Risks to computers
label: heading

line: This policy does not apply to liability, loss, damage, costs or expense directly
label: paragraph

line: or indirectly caused by or in connection with:
label: paragraph

line: a the loss or alteration of or damage to; or
label: paragraph

line: b a reduction in how a system works of
label: paragraph

line: a computer system, hardware programme, software, data-information
label: paragraph

line: store, microchip, integrated circuit or similar device in computer equipment
label: paragraph

line: or non-computer equipment that results from deliberately or negligently
label: paragraph

line: transferring (electronic or otherwise) a computer programme that contains
label: paragraph

line: any damaging code including computer viruses, worms, logic bombs,
label: paragraph

line: or trojan horses.
label: paragraph

line: 7 Wear and Tear
label: heading

line: Your policy is intended to cover you against unforeseen events like fire or theft.
label: paragraph

line: It does not cover wear and tear or damage that occurs gradually over time.
label: paragraph
